name: arkadas-erp
description: Arkadaş Özel Eğitim ve Rehabilitasyon Merkezi - ERP Sistemi

scripts.dev: npm run dev:docker && npm run dev:all
scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n strapi,web,ai,mebbis,mobile -c blue,green,magenta,cyan,yellow "npm run dev:strapi" "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:ai" "npm run dev:mebbis" "npm run dev:mobile"
scripts.prebuild: npm run lint && npm run typecheck
scripts.build: npm run dev:docker && npm run build:all
scripts.build:all: concurrently "npm run build:strapi" "npm run build:web" "npm run build:mebbis"
scripts.build:web: npm run lint --prefix web && npm run build --prefix web
scripts.build:mobile: cd mobile && eas build --platform all --profile production --local
scripts.start:all: concurrently -n strapi,web,mebbis,docker,mobile -c blue,green,cyan,yellow,magenta "npm run start:strapi" "npm run start:web" "npm run start:mebbis" "npm run start:docker" "npm run start:mobile"
scripts.stop: docker compose -f infrastructure/docker-compose.yml down && npx kill-port 3000 1337 4000 8000 8080
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:strapi && npm run install:web && npm run install:mobile && npm run install:mebbis
scripts.install:mebbis: cd mebbis-service && npm install && npx playwright install chromium
scripts.install:ai: cd ai-service && python -m venv venv && .\venv\Scripts\pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.clean:all: concurrently "npm run clean:strapi" "npm run clean:web" "npm run clean:mobile" "npm run clean:mebbis"
scripts.clean:strapi: cd strapi && npx rimraf node_modules .cache build
scripts.clean:mebbis: cd mebbis-service && npx rimraf node_modules dist
scripts.lint: concurrently "npm run lint --prefix web" "npm run lint --prefix strapi"

author: Arkadaş Özel Eğitim
